page.title: 11THE OLD VICARAGE
page.content: All the doors were made of pine. I noticed that all the ceilings were very high.Some of the doors were arched which is very unusual, but looks very nice. In some of the bedrooms there were window seats which were low wide window sills and you could sit on them and store things in them. Also upstairs there was a bathroom which used to be a powder room or wig room. It was called this because women used to take off their wigs in there and powder their heads which had nearly all the hair shaved off to stop their heads itching. The wigs used to be in great fancy hair styles. I thought that it was very interesting and I would love to visit 'The Old Vicarage' again.
